name: Gentleman (itch)
description:
Gentleman

Hi ! everyone, we're so happy to see you here!

Gentleman is a 1-to-4 Players Co-op Action game,

you can choose Knight or Archer,

use attack, dodge and skill, defeat the powerful boss.

Controls
  • Highly recommended use controller.
  • 3-4 Players need 3-4 controllers.
  • Player 1 
    • WSAD : Movement 
    • V :  Dodge
    • B :  Attack
    • N : Skill
    • G : Help
  • Player 2
    • Arrows :  Movement
    • K  : Dodge
    • L   : Attack
    •  ;   : Skill
    • O : Help
